lyrics:
47 contributorsi miss you lyricsintro frank ocean
let the motherfuckin beat build in this bitch
about that

verse 1 beyoncé
i thought that things like this get better with time
but i still need you why is that

i miss you like everyday
wanna be with you but youre away

the words dont ever seem to come out right
but i still mean em why is that
it hurts my pride to tell you how i feel
but i still need to why is that

chorus beyoncé
i miss you like everyday
wanna be with you but youre away
i said i miss you missin you insane
but if i got with you could it feel the same
you might also likebridge beyoncé
it dont matter who you are it is so simple
a feeling but its everything

a feeling but its everything

chorus beyoncé
i miss you like everyday
wanna be with you but youre away but youre away
